channel.title: CVE Feed for NSS -- Network Security Services (NSS)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NSS -- Network Security Services (NSS)

item.title: CVE-2018-12384|2024-08-05T08:31:00.061Z -- nss -- network%20security%20services%20%28nss%29
item.description: When handling a SSLv2-compatible ClientHello request, the server doesn't generate a new random value but sends an all-zero value instead. This results in full malleability of the ClientHello for SSLv2 used for TLS 1.2 in all versions prior to NSS 3.39. This does not impact TLS 1.3.
